intro: Bolelia elegans, commonly known as the elegant bolelia, is a flowering plant belonging to the family Aizoaceae. It is native to southern Africa, where it thrives in arid and semi-arid environments. The plant is characterized by its succulent, fleshy leaves and vibrant, star-shaped flowers that bloom in shades of yellow and orange. Bolelia elegans is often found growing on rocky outcrops and in sandy soils, showcasing its adaptability to harsh conditions. Its unique morphology and ornamental value make it a popular choice for rock gardens and xeriscaping.
